song_lyrics: Āpe bhagvo bhekh Jogī mane, māro vidhilekh par mekh ° ṭek
Māru tāru ne sāru narsu, dekhyā avaḷā dekhjī;
Mitaru verī mān īrakhā, evī paḍī gaī rekh... Jogī° 1
Dariyā jeṭalu dūdh pīdhu, mātājīne peṭjī;
Chorāshī lākhno fero ṭāḷo, lakhī dyo evo lekh... Jogī° 2
Enā gharno dīvaḍo tu, āvyo chho alekh... Jogī° 3
Māyāthī man chhūṭe māru, evu karī dyo dekhjī;
‘Kāg’ manavo Akṣhar bhākhe, Puruṣhottam pekh.. Jogī° 4
title: Āpe bhagvo bhekh Jogī mane

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-979: Kaag Bapu

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
